body:
Any chance you can add a simple reproducer for this?
At the very least, it would be used to test whatever fix we come up with.

Thanks

```
for all other beans it's as if it does not even exist.
```

Ok, but why does this affect the Instance<T> lookup then; if the `@Context` has no effect on my ApplicationScoped Bean?

Thanks for providing a workaround!

> @Context has no effect on my ApplicationScoped Bean?

Precicely, it's like the annotation doesn't even exist. If you replace it with `@Inject`, it will work as you intended

Hey @geoand <3
I dug a bit deeper.
Here is a better reproducer:
https://github.com/Postremus/quarkus/commit/668f605af17d07dc193ff2bfc7a8fd0e39e9f819


Essentially, the test `testContextOnImplOfInterface` works, but the `testContextOnSubclassOfAbstract` fails.
The only difference, in the first one, the GermanGreetingGenerator is an implementation of an interface, in the second one it is extending an abstract class.

If I remove the `@Context` field from the second testcase, it works.



I am reopening - sorry if I am overstepping here - because this seems a bit fishy to me :)
